Ketua DPD RI: Bawa Isu Daerah ke Nasional dengan Pers Sebagai Katalisator
02 Nov 2019, 12:09 by Miechell Octovy Koagouw



Ketua DPD RI: Bawa Isu Daerah ke Nasional dengan Pers Sebagai Katalisator



Ketua DPD RI: Bawa Isu Daerah ke Nasional dengan Pers Sebagai Katalisator


KBRN, Jakarta : Ketua DPD RI Periode 2019-2024, La Nyalla Mattalitti menekankan kepada seluruh senator untuk mampu mengangkat persoalan daerah ke tingkat nasional, bukan sebaliknya membawa isu nasional ke daerahnya masing-masing.Hal tersebut diungkapkan La Nyalla dalam Pers Gathering yang mengangkat tema 'Sinergitas DPD RI dan Insan Pers Guna Penguatan Peran DPD RI Dalam Memperjuangkan Aspirasi Daerah' di Surabaya, Jumat (1/11/2019) malam.Sejatinya wajah Indonesia adalah perwakilan dari 34 provinsi mulai Sabang sampai Merauke, Miangas sampai Pulau Rote. Sehingga berkaitan dengan filosofi itu, para senator DPD RI harus menjalin sinergi dan komunikasi yang harmonis dengan semua lembaga negara terutama pemerintah demi mempercepat pembangunan di daerah."Apalagi Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) sudah menyatakan akan menjalankan konsep pembangunan dengan pendekatan Indonesia sentris yang artinya merata, tidak hanya di pulau Jawa saja," ujar La Nyalla.Itulah sebabnya, kata dia, semua senator DPD RI harus dapat melihat, mencermati, mengidentifikasi dan menemukan jalan keluar persoalan-persoalan di daerah untuk selanjutnya disampaikan kepada pemerintah sebagai masukan,"Untuk itu dibutuhkan peran media massa sebagai katalisator agar persoalan tersebut segera tertangani," imbuhnya.BACA JUGA: La Nyalla Mattalitti : Sinergi DPD RI dengan Insan Pers Harus Semakin Kuat
Seperti diberitakan RRI sebelumnya, Ketua DPD RI La Nyalla Mattalitti menilai, peran pers di Parlemen begitu besar, hal itu dapat dilihat dari bagaimana para pewarta lintas platform media secara terus menerus tanpa kenal lelah mempublikasikan proses-proses dan hasil-hasil sidang maupun peristiwa-peristiwa yang terjadi di DPD RI. "Tanpa kehadiran pers, masyarakat akan sulit mendapatkan informasi tentang hasil dan keputusan DPD RI yang terkait langsung dengan kepentingan daerah. DPD RI dan Pers, sebenarnya mempunyai peran yang sama, yaitu mengawal berlangsungnya demokrasi di Indonesia," sebut La Nyalla dalam Pers Gathering yang mengangkat tema 'Sinergitas DPD RI dan Insan Pers Guna Penguatan Peran DPD RI Dalam Memperjuangkan Aspirasi Daerah' di Surabaya, Jumat (1/11/2019) malam.Dalam hal ini, DPD RI menilai, para jurnalis yang tergabung dalam Koordinatoriat Wartawan Parlemen telah memainkan peran begitu tinggi dalam menginformasikan kerja-kerja nyata anggota dewan, khususnya DPD RI.Seperti diketahui, DPD RI lahir dari konsensus politik nasional untuk memperkuat fungsi perwakilan daerah di tingkat nasional, disamping perwakilan politik DPR RI. Gagasan dasar pembentukan DPD RI adalah menjembatani kepentingan daerah dengan kebijakan nasional, sekaligus memberi peran yang lebih besar kepada daerah dalam pengambilan keputusan politik yang berkaitan langsung dengan daerah.Sebagai Ketua DPD RI Periode 2019-2024, dirinya berharap sinergisitas kerja antara DPD RI dan Insan Pers dapat semakin meningkat guna mencapai cita-cita besar yang diinginkan rakyat. (Sumber: Jorike Fitri/RRI-PRO3)

Chairman of the DPD RI: Bring Regional Issues to the National with the Press as a Catalyst
02 Nov 2019, 12:09 by Miechell Octovy Koagouw



Chairman of the DPD RI: Bring Regional Issues to the National with the Press as a Catalyst



Chairman of the DPD RI: Bring Regional Issues to the National with the Press as a Catalyst


KBRN, Jakarta: Chairman of the DPD RI 2019-2024 Period, La Nyalla Mattalitti emphasized to all senators to be able to raise regional issues to the national level, not to bring national issues to their respective regions. La Nyalla revealed this in the Press Gathering with the theme 'Synergy of the DPD RI and the Press Personnel to Strengthen the Role of the DPD RI in Fighting for Regional Aspirations' in Surabaya, Friday (1/11/2019) night. Truly Indonesia's face is representative of 34 provinces from Sabang to Merauke, Miangas to Rote Island. So related to that philosophy, the senators of the DPD RI must establish synergy and harmonious communication with all state institutions, especially the government in order to accelerate development in the region. "Moreover President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) has stated that he will carry out the concept of development with a centric Indonesia approach which means that it is evenly distributed "Not only on Java," said La Nyalla. That is why, he said, all senators of the DPD RI must be able to see, examine, identify and find solutions to problems in the region to be conveyed to the government as input, "For that the role of mass media is needed as a catalyst so that the issue is immediately addressed, "he added. READ ALSO: La Nyalla Mattalitti: Synergy of the DPD RI with the Personnel of the Press Must Be Stronger
As previously reported by RRI, Chairman of the DPD RI La Nyalla Mattalitti considered, the role of the press in Parliament was so great, it can be seen from how the reporters across the media platforms continuously tirelessly published the processes and results of the trial and events which occurred in the DPD RI. "Without the presence of the press, the public will find it difficult to obtain information about the results and decisions of the DPD RI that are directly related to regional interests. The DPD RI and the Press actually have the same role, namely to oversee the ongoing democracy in Indonesia," said La Nyalla in the Press Gathering that raised theme 'Synergy of the DPD RI and the Press Personnel to Strengthen the Role of the DPD RI in Fighting for Regional Aspirations' in Surabaya, Friday (1/11/2019) evening. In this case, the DPD RI considered that the journalists who were members of the Parliamentary Journalists Coordinator had played a role so high in informing the real work of board members, especially the DPD RI. As is well known, the DPD RI was born from a national political consensus to strengthen the function of regional representatives at the national level, in addition to the political representation of the DPR RI. The basic idea of establishing the DPD RI is to bridge the regional interests with national policies, while at the same time giving a greater role to the regions in making political decisions that are directly related to the region. As the Chairperson of the DPD RI 2019-2024, he hopes the synergy of work between the DPD RI and the Press Personnel can be further increased in order to achieve the great ideals desired by the people. (Source: Jorike Fitri / RRI-PRO3)
